嵎字的基本解释

嵎
yú
山弯曲的地方。
同“隅”。

嵎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yú］
［《廣韻》遇俱切，平虞，疑。］
(1)山势曲折险峻处。
(2)山高貌。参见“嵎峗”、“嵎嵎”。
(3)通“隅”。偏僻之地；角落。
(4)山名。

嵎字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵎； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页316第19
【唐韻】虞俱切【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】元俱切，?音虞。【說文】封嵎之山，在吳楚閒，汪芒氏之國。【徐曰】按魯語，防風氏，守封嵎之山者也。　又嵎夷，日出處。【書·堯典】宅嵎夷曰暘谷。又【禹貢】嵎夷旣略。【註】今登州之地。　又山曲曰嵎。【孟子】虎負嵎。又【支遁述懷詩】息肩棲南嵎。與隅通。

嵎字的起名意思

山弯曲处，同"隅"。

mountain range
Basic explanation of words
mountain range
yú
Where the mountain bends.
Same as "Yun".
mountain range
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yú］
["Guangyun" meets all cuts, pingyu, and suspicion. ]
(1) The mountain is tortuous and steep.
(2) The appearance of high mountains. See "嵎峗", "嵎嵎".
(3) Through "Yun". A remote place; a corner.
(4) The name of the mountain.
mountain range
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵎; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 316 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Yu Juqie [Guang Yun] [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yuan Juqie,? Yin Yu. [Said the text] The mountain of Fengyi, in Wu Chuxian, the country of Wang Mang clan. [Xu Yue] According to Lu language, Fangfeng's family is also the one who keeps Fengshan Mountain.　Yi again, at the sunrise. 【Book·Yaodian】The house is called Yanggu. Also【Yugong】Scheming with the barbarians. [Note] The land of Dengzhou today.　Another mountain song called 嵎. 【Mencius】The tiger bears the house. Also [Zhi Dun Shuhuai Poems] Xi Jianqi Nannan. Connect with corners.
mountain range

Name meaning
The mountain bend is the same as "corner".
yú
I сущ.
1) каньон; крутые скалы
负嵎之势 прижат спиной к стене, загнан в угол; отчаянное положение
2) вм. 隅 (окраина, отдалённая местность)
II собств. геогр.
(сокр. вм. 禺山) Юйшань (горы в пров. Чжэцзян)
